name: Captains House

reviews.title: Beware of the stairs
reviews.text: Given the glowing reviews on this website I guess expectations were set unrealistically high and a little dispointment would not be a suprise.Admittedly the owners were away themselves but their staff looked after us very well breakfast was great and the rooms were clean & fairly well equipped(except no cable tv or phone).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We took the 2 bedroom suite which is at the top of the house with a very tiring walk up several(3) tight flights of stairs(especially with luggage) and you will see pictures that the hotel is on a hill which is already a steep treck up from the beach.This is basically a high standard bed & breakfast, but the surrounding area & properties are not so well kept which detracts from the experience.We stayed with our 2 young children & paid GBP 180 per night which is a hotel price and we thought should be a little cheaper given staff were only there for b'fast & the inconvenience c.f a hotel.
reviews.title: direct from the pages of coast magazine!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: from our welcome on arrival to departure we cannot fault the Captains House, we had a fantastic weekend break. The room (without a sea view!!!!) was spacious, spotless, and beautifully furnished. The bed was so...... comfortable. The bathroom, complete with full size toiletries, lots of towels, and dressing gowns, left nothing to be desired, You could watch TV from the bath! Little touches such as the flavoured coffee selection, quality biscuits on the tea tray, and fresh flowers on the dressing table added to the feeling of luxury.
reviews.title: Not much left to add to the previous reviews...

likes.liked: — The customer service and attention to detail

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was superb, a good selection of cereals, fresh fruit beautifully presented, and the "Captains Special" I could not eat for the rest of the day! Nothing seemed too much trouble for our hosts.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Family style dining seemed a little strange at first but we really enjoyed the conversation with fellow guests, it added to the experience, and the view from the dining table.... stunning!
reviews.title: A perfect stay

likes.liked: — Gillian and James are the perfect hosts

description: The Captain's House is an elegant 7 bedroom Regency house available for rent as an exclusive holiday home.
